function.name: washingRinseCycle_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the number of rinse cycles on a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the rinse cycles.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to increase the rinse cycles.

rinseCycleDelta.description: The delta value to increase the rinse cycles.
